forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Freezing rain early...changing to rain for the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Freezing rain early...changing to rain for the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 33F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low near 0C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 32F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 5C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some rain or snow showers in the morning. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers diminishing in the morning. A few breaks in the clouds in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
